  2. Trump’s Tariffs Leave No Safe Harbor for American Importers  The New York Times
  3. Trump’s China tariff shocks US importers. One CEO calls it ‘end of days’  AP News
  4. Trump tariffs on China will soon bring 'irreversible' damage to many American businesses  CNBC
  5. Trump’s trade war with China is 'the end of the era of expanding globalization.' But it could leave the U.S. worse off because of a major imbalance in key imports  Fortune
